comment.body:
> [portableguy](#comment_1_1EdFvRMCSsjRQDSwKEaYDu3aU2o5PfzhrX): Can you bundle a portable version of Tor for the Mac and Linux version of ZeroNet?

Tor is optional. I don't want it bundled on Linux as it runs as a systemd service already and installs with a single command from the package manager.
